values: To hitchhike means to travel by asking for rides from passing vehicles.
She didn’t have a car, so she hitchhiked several miles to her brother’s home.

- n. 搭便车(旅行)
- vi. 作搭便车式的旅行

时 态:  
hitchhiked, hitchhiking, hitchhikes 

名 词:  
hitchhike

名 词:  
hitchhiker
n.搭便车（旅行）vi.<美><口>作搭便车式的旅行
vi. 免费搭乘他人便车
vi. 免费搭乘他人便车
